conclusion: Violation of Art. 8;Violation of Art. 13;Not necessary to examine Art. 10;Not necessary to examine Art. 14;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
